provider.name: tmux-mcp-agent
provider.description: Cursor MCP integration for shared tmux sessions

tools.name: connect_session
tools.description: Create or attach to a shared tmux session on the selected profile.

profile.description: Name of the stored SSH connection profile.

window.description: Optional window name to ensure exists.

tools.name: submit_command
tools.description: Send a command to the shared tmux pane and capture resulting output.

command_id.description: Optional caller-provided identifier for the command.

metadata.description: Arbitrary metadata stored alongside the log entry.

safe_mode.description: Override default safe-mode behaviour for this command only.

force.description: Execute immediately and mark as user-approved.

tools.name: approve_command
tools.description: Approve a previously submitted command that was waiting for confirmation.

tools.name: reject_command
tools.description: Reject a pending command awaiting approval.

tools.name: read_context
tools.description: Capture the current tmux pane content for model grounding.

tools.name: upsert_profile
tools.description: Save or update an SSH connection profile.

tools.name: delete_profile
tools.description: Remove an SSH profile by name.
